name: Open Ownership's Global Register of Beneficial Ownership
description:
Beneficial ownership data from the Open Ownership Register, an aggregation of data covering more than 8 million companies and 9 million people, linked by 24 million statements of ownership or control.

The data is regularly sourced from the national beneficial ownership registers of the UK, Denmark and Ukraine, along with sectoral disclosures from Slovakia and The Extractive Industries Transparency Initiative beneficial ownership pilot of 2013-15. In addition to aggregating these sources, company data is standardised and kept up to date via regular matching with OpenCorporates, as well as being de-duplicated by our own internal processes.

The data is structured according to the [Beneficial Ownership Data Standard](https://standard.openownership.org) and offered as a single JSONLines formatted file, with one statement per line.

Please see [our documentation](https://register.openownership.org/download) and [changelog](https://register.openownership.org/data-changelog) for more information.
